subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Chien-Ming Wang of Taiwan, who won 19 games for the Yankees in 2006 and in 2007, has a minor league deal with the team and could return to the majors.
snippet: Pitcher Chien-Ming Wang of Taiwan, who won 19 games for the Yankees in 2006 and in 2007, has a minor league deal with the team and could return to the majors.
